column1: Kata Robata////The Japanese Snapper shasimi is to die for! This fish is not available everywhere but they have it all the time at Kata
column2: it is a must try! If youve never heard of sea urchin pasta you need to try this! This was my first time eating this dish and sometimes I am not fond of sea urchin because it might taste fishy but this pasta is a perfect blend of everything Â I LOVE it! Here are a couple more dishes you should try when you go there...
